attributes.action: Ensure that legislation is in place to make it illegal for Association of Former Members of Parliament (AFMP) to be given public money to travel.
attributes.additional_details: These people have been voted out of office and have nothing more to contribute to the well-being or destruction of our society and country (depending on your view of the activity of elected dishonourables) and should only be given money to pay for their travel if that same benefit is to be extended to every single taxpaying person in the country.  THIS MISAPPROPRIATION MUST NOT BE ALLOWED TO HAPPEN.
